a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in per capita CO₂ emissions and GDP, World
This measures fossil fuel and industry emissions. Land-use change is not included.
Data source: Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project Database 2023; Global Carbon Budget (2023); Population based on various
Note: GDP is adjusted for inflation.
